screens.typography_notes: The style guide showcases various font sizes and styles, including headings and body text. The font used is Inter Display V.
screens.primary_purpose: To demonstrate the typography style guide for the Tendly CRM Website Template UI Kit
screens.enterprise_os_potential: This layout could be reused in other style guides or documentation pages for enterprise OS applications.
